text: hi everyone today I'm going to share
with you my mom's secret recipe which is
the red or black bean porridge she
normally cooked us when one of us is
sick or if I'm going to an exam tomorrow
the red bean porridge will bring me lots
of luck because red is a lucky color and
being or a doll in Vietnamese also means
passing the exam so let's start here the
list of ingredients firstly you need to
soak the beans in warm water for at
least four hours or better overnight
after one night the beans grow bigger
and this will speed up the cooking
process for the rice we just wash it the
normal way next week a 500 gram beef
shank into bite-sized pieces if you
don't like if you can use pork bones as
well then slide the ginger into thin
strips
in a pressure cooker pouring two and a
half liter of water and adding all the
ingredients including the well drained
on red beans and the rice and so I asked
the beef if you use secure eyes instead
of normal rice it will be even better
then call the pot on high heat until it
boils next let's prepare our seasoning
mix in a mortar and pestle crush two red
shallots with a teaspoon of salt three
tablespoons of fish sauce and a teaspoon
of pepper mix them all together
when the pot boys we skim up the phone
then add in their seasoning mix and
ginger
to enrich the taste you can also add in
3 TSP of chicken stock
then close the pressure cooker properly
and cook for half an hour or medium-low
if you don't have our pressure cooker
you can use normal pot but then you need
to cook for one hour and have to stir it
up once in a while
lastly we chop the spring onion and
cilantro into small pieces and sprinkle
on top of the Polish bowl so we are done
get well soon our good luck to yourself
and thank you for watching bye bye
